Class BinaryArithmetic.needShift

    BinaryArithmetic

    private class BinaryArithmetic.needShift
extends java.lang.Object
    This needShift class group all shift function that have been use in this outer class.

      (package private) java.lang.String rightShift(java.lang.String value, int numbertoShift)
      This method is use to shift more bit (zero) to the right to make this value have the number of bit.
      (package private) java.lang.String Shift(java.lang.String FirstValue, java.lang.String SecondValue)
      This method is use to shift more bit to the left to make this two value have the same number of bit.

      • Shift

        java.lang.String Shift(java.lang.String FirstValue,
                       java.lang.String SecondValue)
        This method is use to shift more bit to the left to make this two value have the same number of bit.
        Parameters:
        FirstValue - as binary String
        SecondValue - as binary String
        Returns:
        value after shift as string.

      • rightShift

        java.lang.String rightShift(java.lang.String value,
                            int numbertoShift)
        This method is use to shift more bit (zero) to the right to make this value have the number of bit.
        Parameters:
        value - is the value that need to shift.
        numbertoShift - is the number of zero that want append to the right.
        Returns:
        value as string.
